Class StateChartFunction

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StateChartFunction
extends StateChartInvariantComponent
    Represents a function contained in a StateChartComponent.

    Antoine Orgerit

    • Method Detail

      • setAgent

        public void setAgent(StateChartAgent agent)
        Description copied from class: StateChartComponent
        Allows to set the agent to the StateChartComponent and/or its subcomponents. This method must be implemented to properly define the setting of the agent to the component.
        Specified by:
        setAgent in class StateChartComponent
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent to set to the component as a StateChartAgent

      • evaluate

        protected boolean evaluate()
                    throws StateChartFunctionException
        Description copied from class: StateChartInvariantComponent
        Allows to evaluate the StateChartInvariantComponent depending on what it contains.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class StateChartInvariantComponent
        Returns:
        true if the invariant component is evaluated to true, false otherwise
        Throws:
        StateChartFunctionException - if an error occurred while evaluating the invariant component functions

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws StateChartFunctionException
        Allows to execute the StateChartFunction according to the StateChartAgent on which to invoke the function.
        Throws:
        StateChartFunctionException - if no agent is set for the function, or if an error occurred while invoking the function
